sentence: Trump is also backing former NFL star Herschel Walker in the race against Democratic Sen. Raphael Warnock in Georgia, where many Republicans blamed the former president for costing the party both its Senate seats in a January 2021 runoff by stoking debunked conspiracy theories about election fraud.
author: Igor Derysh
title: Republicans in chaos: Conflict with Trump endangers GOP Senate prospects

sentence: Then theres Herschel Walker, gliding to the Georgia Senate nomination on Off-Brand Orbns endorsement, despite new police records shining fresh light on his extremely disturbing history of mental health issues, and domestic abuse.
title: Welcome to the Bouncy Castle Insurrection (Everything is Very Stupid)

sentence: In Georgia, Trump has endorsed former NFL player Herschel Walker in the GOP Senate primary.
author: Juan Williams
title: Juan Williams: Trump rains on McConnells parade
